Name: Start/Stop
Active power fixed adjustment target value
Reactive power fixed adjustment target value
Comment: Range: [-60.00 * base value, 60.00 * base value]. Takes effect globally regardless of the EMS operating mode.

Name: Active power percentage adjustment target value
Q/S adjustment target value
Comment: Range: [-60.00, 60.00]. Takes effect globally regardless of the EMS operating mode.

Name: Power factor adjustment target value
Comment: Range: (-1, -0.8] U [0.8, 1]. Grid Sensor needed. Takes effect globally regardless of the EMS operating mode.

Name: Phase A active power fixed adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

Name: Phase B active power fixed adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

Name: Phase C active power fixed adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

Name: Phase A reactive power fixed adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

Name: Phase B reactive power fixed adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

Name: Phase C reactive power fixed adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N

Name: Phase A Active power percentage adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N. Range: [-100.00

Name: Phase B Active power percentage adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N. Range: [-100.00

Name: Phase C Active power percentage adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N. Range: [-100.00

Name: Phase A Q/S fixed adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N. Range: [-60.00

Name: Phase B Q/S fixed adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N. Range: [-60.00

Name: Phase C Q/S fixed adjustment target value
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N. Range: [-60.00

Name: Reserved
Remote EMS enable
Comment: 0: disabled 1: enabled When needed to control EMS remotely, this register needs to be enabled. When enabled, the plant’s EMS work mode (30003) will switch to remote EMS.

Name: Independent phase power control enable
Valid only when output type is L1/L2/L3/N. To enable independent phase control
Comment: this parameter must be enabled. 0: disabled 1: enabled

Name: Remote EMS control mode
Comment: Mode values’ definition refer to Appendix 6

Name: ESS max charging limit
Comment: Rated ESS charging power]. Takes effect when Remote EMS control mode (40031) is 3 or 4.

Name: ESS max discharging limit
Comment: Rated ESS discharging power]. Takes effect when Remote EMS control mode (40031) is 5 or 6.

Name: PV max power limit
Takes effect when Remote EMS control mode (40031) is 3

Name: [Grid Point] Maximum export limitation
Comment: Grid Sensor needed. Takes effect globally regardless of the EMS operating mode.

Name: [Grid Point] Maximum import limitation
Comment: Grid Sensor needed. Takes effect globally regardless of the EMS operating mode.

Name: PCS maximum export limitation
Comment: Range: [0, 0xFFFFFFFE]. With value 0xFFFFFFFF, register is not valid. In all other cases, Takes effect globally.

Name: PCS maximum import limitation
Comment: Range: [0, 0xFFFFFFFE]. With value 0xFFFFFFFF, register is not valid. In all other cases, Takes effect globally.
